0.5.name: wordpress/macks-cricket-news-feed
0.5.description:
Mack's Cricket News Feed plugin incorporates an external RSS news feed into a cool looking Flash news feed. The feed moves from bottom to top, with a nice Cricket graphic, followed by headlines and stories. You can click on a story title or summary to see the actual page where it is posted. You can also edit the width and height of the plugin to suit your needs. Finally, you can select how many articles you want to appear in the feed: 1 to 10.

Relevant Keywords: cricket, cricket news, cricket game, cricket games, cricket results, ipl, ipl cricket, icc, icc cricket, t20, t20 cricket, indian cricket, india cricket, english cricket, england cricket

Thanks,

Mack Bincroft
